about_the_game:
Binding is an atmospheric, story-driven adventure set in a hauntingly beautiful post-apocalyptic world. Follow Billy and his loyal dog, Tessa, as they navigate a landscape transformed by catastrophe and tinged with supernatural elements.

Features:

  • A Deeply Personal Journey: Uncover Billy’s past and the fateful night that changed everything as you explore his memories and the remnants of the world he once knew.

  • Dual Perspectives: Switch between Billy and Tessa to solve puzzles, uncover hidden paths, and use their unique abilities to overcome obstacles. Billy offers human insight and interaction, while Tessa brings canine senses and agility to the forefront.

  • Rich Narrative: Engage with a story of survival, loss, and hope. The decisions you make influence the events that unfold, leading to a gripping tale that’s uniquely yours.

  • Stunning Visuals and Sound: Traverse breath-taking landscapes brought to life with striking graphics and a captivating soundtrack. From desolate towns to eerie forests, each setting is both a visual feast and a challenge to explore.

  • Supernatural Elements: Experience surreal encounters and dream-like sequences that blend reality with imagination, adding layers of depth to your quest.

Binding offers a blend of emotional storytelling and innovative gameplay that invites players to experience a world where every decision counts and every moment is bittersweet. Join Billy and Tessa as they search for meaning in the ruins and perhaps find a new beginning.
